name: Doesn't Match
description:
The power is off, your only source of light is a candle, and you have a small fear of fire. At least you have an infinite amount of matches.

A, S, D = arm segments
Space = pinch
Enter = draw match
W = blow

Rover the mouse over the achievements for more info.

Created for Ludum Dare 39: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/doesnt-match
